duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitate agile ceremonies including sprint planning, review, retrospective, and daily standups.
Coach and mentor teams on Agile processes, with emphasis on large-scale Agile deployments.
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand technology ecosystem and support the team's delivery.
Utilize Jira to manage and track Agile projects effectively.
Support and guide the adoption of Large-Scale Scrum framework within the organization.

education_certification.credential: Certified Scrum Master and other Scrum certifications are helpful.
